name: Missing Child Foundation
tag_list: missing-child, missing-children, child-locator, child-abduction, child-safety, missing-and-exploited-children
overview:
MCF increased parental preparedness and awareness involving the issue of missing and abducted children.

MCF achieves its goal mainly through the distribution of Child ID Kits and Online Family memberships to its website. Each parental account can handle up to 10 children, and has functionality not found anywhere else that gives the parent valuable tools to utilize in the event of a missing child incident. Such as KidzBlast. KidzBlast is an automated alert notification system that sends email and cell text messages to a designated contact list with just one click. Access can be granted to law enforcement to expedite the dissemination of critical information to be used when searching for a missing child. KidzPoster generates a missing child poster that can be printed locally and emailed to a print shop or media outlets.
